item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Sarah! I’m a freelance web developer, artist, plant mom, and tea enthusiast. I work primarily with a Javascript stack (though I’ve been known to tinker in Ruby & Python) on application-layer development with a focus on usability and creating common good. You can find my code on GitHub, my doodles on Dribbble, my resume on LinkedIn, and drop me a line on Mastodon. âœ¨
